feed.title: Homer Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Homer: v24.04.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Main changes

  • Update customservices.md with Readarr link by @EatMoreChicken in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/757
  • Update README.md by @Alceatraz in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/756
  • fix: improve grammar of offline message by @librick in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/736
  • Add OpenHAB custom service by @andreapier in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/744

New Contributors

  • @EatMoreChicken made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/757
  • @Alceatraz made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/756
  • @librick made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/736
  • @andreapier made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/744

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/compare/v24.02.1...v24.04.1

entry.title: New release for Homer: v24.05.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Main changes

  • Fix Pi-hole logo URL by @flooxo in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/734
  • Mylar Custom Service by @SenorSmartyPants in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/779
  • Adding support for Home Assistant by @emilywotruba in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/783

entry.title: New release for Homer: v24.10.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Main changes

  • docs: update kubernetes installation with multiple solution by @jplanckeel in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/782
  • Added custom service jellystat by @TheWhale01 in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/770
  • Fix up deploy previews by @daniel-simpson in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/749
  • feat(ui): Rework theming system, add new theme. by @bastienwirtz in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/789
  • Update theming.md by @fbartels in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/795
  • Add Sonarr, Lidarr and radarr missing notif by @royto in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/680

New Contributors

  • @jplanckeel made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/782
  • @TheWhale01 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/770
  • @daniel-simpson made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/749

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/compare/v24.05.1...v24.10.1

entry.title: New release for Homer: v24.10.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

Main changes

  • Update README.md for tarball install cmds by @mattxcnm in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/737
  • Tips & Tricks with message.content to show camera live feed + docs by @matheusvellone in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/733
  • Fix octoprint timestamp by @the-kaustubh in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/693
  • fix: Update Mealie service component endpoints by @bobonthenet in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/723
  • FreshRSS custom service. by @thedroid in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/672
  • Add Nextcloud custom service by @meonkeys in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/650

New Contributors

  • @mattxcnm made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/737
  • @matheusvellone made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/733
  • @the-kaustubh made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/693
  • @bobonthenet made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/723
  • @meonkeys made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/650

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/compare/v24.10.1...v24.10.2

entry.title: New release for Homer: v24.11.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Main changes

  • Update README.md by @alexfornuto in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/816
  • Add the option to set custom headers in the custom service client by @h3ku in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/649
  • Pass accept header when fetching the message via url by @RonaldJerez in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/605
  • feat: Add Gotify custom service component by @richid in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/706
  • Improve warning and missing reports for Radarr connections by @Bothari in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/809
  • Display round-trip time on the subtitle of the custom service ping by @sebersta in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/800
  • Fixes mealie when meal plan is empty by @rhardih in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/819
  • Fix immich widget after breaking changes update by @Canti23 in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/821

New Contributors

  • @alexfornuto made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/816
  • @h3ku made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/649
  • @RonaldJerez made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/605
  • @richid made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/706
  • @Bothari made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/809
  • @sebersta made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/800
  • @rhardih made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/819
  • @Canti23 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/821

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/compare/v24.10.2...v24.11.1
